messages.noPermission: &5TChat &e> &cYou do not have permission to execute this command.
messages.reloadSuccess: &5TChat &e> &aThe TChat configuration has been successfully reloaded.
messages.reloadError: &5TChat &e> &cError reloading TChat configuration. Check the format_config.json file.
messages.onlyPlayer: &5TChat &e> &cThis command can only be executed by a player.
messages.chatCooldownMessage: &5TChat &e> &cYou must wait %time% seconds before sending another message.
messages.antiSpamBlocked: &5TChat &e> &cYou cannot send messages with repeated letters.
messages.antiAdvertisingIPv4Blocked: &5TChat &e> &cIPv4 addresses are not allowed in chat.
messages.antiAdvertisingDomainBlocked: &5TChat &e> &cDomain names are not allowed in chat.
messages.noLastConversationalist: &5TChat &e> &cYou have no recent conversations to reply to.
messages.chatColorInvalid: &5TChat &e> &cInvalid colour. Valid colours are: black, darkblue, darkgreen, darkaqua, darkred, purple, gold, gray, darkgray, blue, green, aqua, red, pink, yellow, white.
